channel.title: Command ::Banish, Similar to jail! [Delta 317] + [Easy]!
channel.description:
Hello everyone. I need a command named ::banish. Basically, it's my ::jail command. So when someone says ::banish (someone's name) -- Ex. ::banish clock, it would send the player "clock" to the coords...
X= 2008 Y= 4762
Thanks. P.S. -- Could you make it so i can set a timer? And no, i do not need anti-teleblock or anti-command for this command.

item.title: Command ::Banish, Similar to jail! [Delta 317] + [Easy]!
item.dc:creator: @Blankk Blankk
item.description:
@Blankk wrote:

Thank you everyone. Now i just need one last thing. When you are in jail, you are muted. How do i make the person, when in jail, unmuted?

Read full topic

"shame " is six characters, the code SJ gave you says:

Change the 5 to a 6.
[/quote]the word shame is 6 characters?

uhhhhhh

There is a space in the quotes I believe.[/quote]

::shame(SPACE)name

item.description:
@Blankk wrote:

I used your code, and it worked… But when i try and do ::shame (player name)
Example…
::shame Work
It says: Name doesn’t exist.
But the name does exist, and the player is online…? i tried this with two accounts.

Please help, and thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Command ::Banish, Similar to jail! [Delta 317] + [Easy]!
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:


if(command.startsWith("") && playerRights >= #)  {//whatever player rights here..
	try {
		String otherPName = command.substring(5);
		int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

		if (otherPIndex != -1) {
			client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];
			toX = ####;//coords here
			toY = ####;//coords here
			action = 1;
			sendMessage("You have been jailed by " + playerName);
		} else { 
			sendMessage("The name doesnt exist."); 
		}
	} catch (Exception e) { 
		sendMessage("Enter the persons name you want to jail right next time.");
	}
}

It doesn’t take a rocket scientist for simple java.

Read full topic
